short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gathers all the links in a webpage and opens a music player with the songs (.mp3, .ogg, .flac, .m4a, etc.).
short.fr: Regroupe tous les liens d'une page et ouvre un lecteur multimédia avec les musiques trouvées (.mp3, .ogg, .flac, .m4a, etc.).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a client-side music player. It gathers all the links in a webpage and opens a media player with the musics (.mp3, .ogg, .flac, .m4a, etc.). 

It works great with open directories. If you want to find open directories with musics, head this way : https://www.reddit.com/r/opendirectories
or use the integrated search box.

More about me: https://nszx.fr
long.es_419:
This extension is a client-side music player.

It gathers all the links in a webpage and opens a media player with the musics (.mp3, .ogg, .flac, .m4a, etc.).
Playlists can be saved and re-imported later.
The current playlist can be downloaded as a ZIP file.
4 colour themes are available.

It works great with open directories.
If you want to find open directories with musics, head this way : https://www.reddit.com/r/opendirectories
or use the integrated search box.

Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
